0.3.0.en: Project forked and app ownership in Homey store transfered to baldhors@gmail.com. Added support for ESPhome based cover. Please log issues on the github project!

0.3.2.en: Attempt to solve capabilities and cards handled by the app in homey store

0.3.3.en: Added support for consoleRe, it can be enabled from app settings

0.3.4.en: Fixed issues #8, #9 and #10. Also include a fix to console.re to avoid stackcall overflow

0.3.5.en: Improved console.re support, now ensure none of the log messages are lost at start of the application.

0.3.6.en: Fixed a timeout handling in console.re client

0.4.0.en: BETA: new wizard driver, fully independant from legacy driver, so no risk of collision. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK

0.4.1.en: BETA: refacto of wizard driver, imply breaking changes (sorry). The wizard driver should be stable enough to avoid breaking changes in the future

0.4.2.en: Wizard is fully implemented. Still in BETA as more testing is necessary

0.4.3.en: A few fix to Wizard driver

0.4.4.en: FIX: few fix for edge cases

0.4.5.en: WIZARD: Added support for title option a few more things

0.4.6.en: Can create a virtual device directly from the native capability list + some fix"

0.5.0.en: Legacy driver is deprecated, long life to the wizard!

0.5.1.en: Wizard is not in BETA anymore, legacy driver is deprecated

0.5.3.en: password are now supported as expected

0.5.4.en: Fixed #19, and now all logs from the browser will also be sent to console.re. Passwords are filtered out in a generic way to ensure even new logs will not include passwords!

0.5.5.en: No more circular reference in console.re and it is now possible to modify a device settings through the wizard (ip address, port and password)

0.6.0.en: Added support for encryption key. Improved new_device / update settyings views

0.6.2.en: fix: length of encryption key in new_device view

0.6.4.en: Fixed: Errors where not correctly sent to console.re. Fix: Added error management for unexisting native capability used by a virtual device

0.6.5.en: Fix: added compatible with virtual devices created before implementation of encryption key support

0.6.6.en: Improved console.re logs. console.re will deactivate after 2 consecutive days"

0.6.7.en: Fixed issue in console.re auto disable

0.6.8.en: Fixed 2 bugs when the entityId change (entityId are calculated by esphome on the name of the entity, so if you change them, the id change)

0.7.0.en: The wizard can now modify a virtual device's class

0.7.1.en: Added tags to help find the app in Homey store

0.7.2.en: Fixed #28: The driver should correctly reconnect to the physical device if

0.7.3.en: Testing fix for #35: reconnection is now handled at high level client, not low level

1.0.0.en: Full redesign of the wizard, this version is for TEST purpose ONLY

1.0.1.en: Corrected a few bugs related to bearer token for new virtual device

1.0.2.en: Several fix, and added advices for migrated users

1.0.3.en: Fixed #47 memory leak when reconnection occur (hopefully)

1.0.4.en: Fixed #50 and corrected back page of edit physiucal device

1.0.5.en: Fixed #48: removing text capability support, I will add new custom capabilities later

1.1.0.en: Implemented #42: Added support for Climate and Select entities! UNTESTED!

1.1.1.en: Added missing zoneActivity option for alarm_motion and alarm_contact capabilities + fixed a tiny bug related to esphome_enum capability

1.1.4.en: corrected source link in app.json and enhanced console.re max queue handling

1.1.5.en: Added esphome_text and esphome_select custom capabilities for #42

1.1.7.en: Fixed #54 and #44: Now, you can collect debug logs directly from the page Manage your physical devices

1.1.8.en: Fixed Climate handling of list of values

1.1.10.en: Updated readme files .. forbidden to write url in the readme, using app.json instead

1.1.11.en: Small fix in console.re to avoid an undefined exception when I added the reconnection delay

1.1.12.en: Moved console.re to the Wizard, there are no more App settings! (issue #15)

1.1.14.en: Added custom enum for horizontale swing mode (#42), flow card of esphome_select can be used

1.1.15.en: Implementation of Climate.mode: added convert functions from numeric to string and back (#42)

1.1.17.en: several fixes: 1/ Addition, modification and deletion of capabilities were not updating correctly a virtual device availability. 2/ getable option was not initialized correctly (getable mean: can be read and not 'write only' :p) 3/ ESPhome sameple config for wired heater is fully tested and functionnal (I moved all my heaters to ESPhome) -> Bye bye Tasmota and MQTT

1.1.18.en: One more fix to #42: flowCard need retrieve the concerned device from the args, and cards should be setup in the driver, not the device

1.1.19.en: And yet another #42 fix: esphome_enum_ should trigger card the same way as esphome_select does

1.1.20.en: Fixed getCapabilityValue and capabilityListener issues for the esphome_* cards

1.1.21.en: Added warning and notification for legacy driver/device => I will remove support/code soon

1.1.22.en: Implementation of #66, to be tested by end user

1.1.23.en: Fix #65: added error management to decimals and min/max options

1.1.24.en: Implemented zone filter in list virtual devices page (#61)

1.1.25.en: Removed auto from available values for esphome_enum_mode_AA (#66)

1.1.26.en: Added support for Mitsubishi Heavy Industries (MHI) airco enum (#67)

1.1.27.en: Was missing a value in the numeric to string conversion for fanMode (#67)

1.1.28.en: Full rework of the ESPhome triggers, conditions and action cards (#41). The cards related to ESPhome_select are deprecated => please migrate to ESPhome_text cards! ESPhome_text cards now supports ALL the capabilities (whatever their type: boolean, enum, text, number, ...). Also fixed: Link in Wizard not appearing blue AND capability options saved as null or empty string (at startup, your conf will be cleaned).

1.1.29.en: Fix for cleaning up null and empty capability options (#41)

1.1.30.en: Corrected a few bugs and added measure_duration custom capability (#41)

1.1.31.en: Fixed a bug introduced when adding the collect debug info function (#69)

1.1.32.en: Attempt for a fix to #70, but I just cannot reproduce, and so cannot test it. However, I made a regression pass.

1.2.0.en: Implemented meansure angle, duration, length and weight custom capabilities (why those are not standard!?). Context aware cards are fully functionnal.

1.2.2.en: Fix #74 + Updated low level api version

1.3.0.en: #57 Definitevely removed support for legacy driver, users had warning since over a month.

1.3.1.en: Implementation of Light State and Brightness (#75)

1.3.2.en: Move back to reconnection function of the low level api + upgraded version of low level api (#78)

1.3.4.en: Removed deprecated flow cards (sorry if it breaks your flows => you just need to replace them), and fixed a tiny bug in context aware condition cards (related to float/integer comparaison)

1.3.5.en: Updated dependancies, including more logs for #83

1.3.6.en: Fix - Do not consider errors as disconnection

1.3.7.en: Put back my own implmentation of autoreconnect (cf. #88)

1.3.8.en: Solved some edge cases (no so edge actually) in the reconnect feature

1.3.10.en: Improved resilience of context aware flow cards
